item.title: Why Is Jay Barnes So Angry?
item.description: Remember this? I’m sure you have some cosmic rationale But here you are with your faith And your Peter Pan advice You have no scars on your face And you cannot handle pressure The pressure Pressure 1, 2, 3, 4 Pressure! Read more: Billy Joel - Pressure Lyrics | MetroLyrics Jay Barnes is the chairman of the Missouri House impeachment committee. By all accounts, Greasy Jay, as he’s known on Twitter, is also acting like a raving lunatic.
